title: url redirection
content:
Summary:
[the following url is vulnerable to redirect]
https://app.upchieve.org
Steps To Reproduce:
when you add @evil.com the user will be directed to evil.com
https://app.upchieve.org@evil.com
Impact
Users could get redirected to malicious domain
steps: Observe that the browser redirects to evil.com instead of the intended upchieve.org domain
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves a URL redirection flaw where appending '@evil.com' to the original URL (https://app.upchieve.org) causes the browser to redirect to the malicious domain (evil.com). This occurs due to improper handling of URLs with userinfo sections (the part before the '@' symbol).
reason: The attack is straightforward and does not involve multiple components, complex states, or novel logic. URL redirection vulnerabilities of this nature are well-documented and commonly tested.
